title.value: Neural semantic tagging for natural language-based search in building information models: Implications for practice
title.justification: The title is clearly mentioned at the start of the document before the authors' names and affiliations.
title.quote: Neural semantic tagging for natural language-based search in building information models: Implications for practice

extractions.description: This paper addresses the challenges of retrieving and utilizing information from Building Information Models (BIM) through natural language-based search, emphasizing semantic tagging of user queries. It introduces a semantic annotation scheme rooted in the Industry Foundation Classes (IFC) schema and conducts experiments comparing traditional and emergent deep learning architectures for NLP tasks within the BIM context.

type.justification: The study conducts a series of experiments to compare traditional and emergent deep learning architectures, indicating an empirical approach to evaluate the methods.
type.quote: By taking a comparative approach, we conducted a series of experiments to identify the strengths and weaknesses of traditional and emergent deep learning architectures for the task at hand.

name.justification: The paper focuses on natural language processing applications, such as semantic tagging to facilitate information retrieval from BIM models.
name.quote: Natural language processing (NLP) offers a promising avenue to address this need by developing systems that can process user queries and extract pertinent information from vast building models.

name.justification: The research investigates natural language-based search in building information models (BIM), which is a key focus of the study.
name.quote: ...the research community has started to investigate advanced natural language-based search for building information models.

name.justification: Semantic tagging is a central task discussed in the paper for identifying and classifying references related to building entities.
name.quote: This study focuses on the semantic tagging of user queries, which is a cardinal task for the identification and classification of references related to building entities.

name.justification: The paper mentions the use of Transformers as part of its keyword set, indicating its importance in the study.
name.quote:
Keywords:
Natural language processing (NLP)
Deep learning
Transformers

is_contributed.justification: Transformers are not a contribution of this paper; they are well-established models in NLP.
is_contributed.quote:
Keywords:
Natural language processing (NLP)

is_executed.justification: The execution environment (GPU or CPU) is not specified for Transformers in the paper.
is_executed.quote: There is no specific mention of execution on GPU or CPU.

is_compared.justification: The paper compares traditional and emergent deep learning architectures, likely including Transformers, for evaluating their strengths and weaknesses.
is_compared.quote: We conducted a series of experiments to identify the strengths and weaknesses of traditional and emergent deep learning architectures for the task at hand.

referenced_paper_title.justification: The paper does not provide a specific reference for the Transformers model.
referenced_paper_title.quote: No reference paper title given for Transformers.

name.justification: The paper contains a dataset link pointing to 'ifc-neural-parser', indicating its relevance to the study.
